{
    "shop_name": {
        "en": "My Shop",
        "fr": "Ma Boutique"
    },
    "description": {
        "en": "Welcome to my shop!",
        "fr": "Bienvenue dans ma boutique !"
    },
    "logo_image_url": "http://localhost:3000/images/fa625683-20fa-4c3c-a492-141a4415d4d8",
    "content_images": null,
    "payment_methods": [
        "Credit Card",
        "PayPal"
    ],
    "terms_conditions": {
        "en": "Terms and conditions...",
        "fr": "Conditions gnrales..."
    },
    "pickup_delay_time": 20,
    "social_media_links": {
        "facebook_link": "https://facebook.com/myshop",
        "x_link": "",
        "instagram_link": "https://instagram.com/myshop",
        "tiktok_link": "https://tiktok.com/@myshop"
    },
    "theme": {
        "--body-bg-color": "#ffffff",
        "--body-text-color": "#212529",
        "--border-color": "#010102",
        "--border-focus-color": "#80bdff",
        "--border-radius-large": "1rem",
        "--border-radius-medium": "0.5rem",
        "--border-radius-small": "0.25rem",
        "--box-shadow-lg": "0 1rem 3rem rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.175)",
        "--box-shadow-md": "0 0.5rem 1rem rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)",
        "--box-shadow-sm": "0 0.125rem 0.25rem rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.075)",
        "--button-bg-color": "#007bff",
        "--button-hover-bg-color": "#0069d9",
        "--button-hover-text-color": "#ffffff",
        "--button-text-color": "#ffffff",
        "--component-bg-color": "#d7dce0",
        "--danger-color": "#dc3545",
        "--dark-color": "#343a40",
        "--font-family-base": "-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif",
        "--font-family-heading": "inherit",
        "--font-family-monospace": "SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', 'Courier New', monospace",
        "--font-size-base": "1rem",
        "--font-size-large": "1.25rem",
        "--font-size-small": "0.875rem",
        "--font-weight-bold": "700",
        "--font-weight-normal": "400",
        "--heading-text-color": "#343a40",
        "--info-color": "#17a2b8",
        "--light-color": "#f8f9fa",
        "--line-height-base": "1.5",
        "--link-hover-text-color": "#0056b3",
        "--link-text-color": "#007bff",
        "--primary-color": "#007bff",
        "--secondary-color": "#6c757d",
        "--spacing-lg": "1.5rem",
        "--spacing-md": "1rem",
        "--spacing-sm": "0.5rem",
        "--spacing-xl": "2rem",
        "--spacing-xs": "0.25rem",
        "--success-color": "#28a745",
        "--warning-color": "#ffc107",
        "--z-index-fixed": "500",
        "--z-index-overlay": "400"
    }
}
